KISHOR NIKAM is an acclaimed professional cinematographer and a passionate photographer based at the historical city Aurangabad in the state of Maharashtra state in India whose work has been appreciated by millions of the connoisseurs all over India and abroad.

He has Master’s degree in Fine Art (Photography) and Journalism

He is having hands on professional experience of more than two decades in all types of photography.

He has participated many national and international exhibitions including Jahangir Art Gallery Mumbai and at Singapore.

His cinematographic skills in the national award winning movie “Not Only Mrs.Raut” and “Dashakriya” were admired by the global film fraternity.

His expertise in Industrial Photography, Fashion Photography, Portraits, Branding and Areal Photography and coffee table books. is undisputed

INDUSTRIAL PHOTOGRAPHY
Helps industries in effectively showcasing their expertise in industrial processes, sophistication in contemporary machinery, and proficiency in manufacturing techniques.

TABLETOP PHOTOGRAPHY
A genre of commercial product/still life photography vitalfor products like food and drinks, gadgets, cosmetics, etc.

ARCHITECTURAL PHOTOGRAPHY
Photography of aesthetically pleasing buildings and other similar structures for accurate representation of the subjects.

ADVERTISING PHOTOGRAPHY
Photography for branding ,editorial content in magazines, books calendars, advertisements, websites and other forms of media.

AERIAL PHOTOGRAPHY
Photography for archaeology, movie production, environmental studies, power line inspection, surveillance, commercial advertising, etc.

360-degree PHOTOGRAPHY PANAROMA
Effective for showing off panoramas, internal architecture and more in a dramatic fashion that replicates the experience of being there.

PORTRAIT PHOTOGRAPHY
A photograph of a person or group of person that captures a personality of a person or subject with effective use of lights, backdrops and poses.

FASHION PHOTOGRAPHY
A genre devoted for displaying clothing and other fashion items for the advertisements and fashion magazines.
